name: Goldeen

evolution.description: Goldeen can evolve into Seaking at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Goldfish Pokémon. When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: If this Pokemon or an ally within 30 feet is targeted with a direct electric-type, damage-dealing move, the Pokemon may use a reaction to redirect the target to itself and take half damage from it if it hits.
